TopicTitle: QoL Feature: Retention of camera settings in flight and map view

Articles.Content:
The first situation:
In map view, I may have to drill down into a planet to get to the moon I intend to intercept from afar and switching back to flight view, this map view setting is lost when I return.

QoL Feature request:
Allow the map to retain settings until you return to the KSC or switch control to another ship that is too far away to switch to with brackets.

Another situation:
In flight view, and especially while docking, we may want to aim the camera at specific parts, like the docking ports affected, and at just the right angle or zoom. Swapping between craft with brackets jumps the camera to the default focus on that craft, losing all the work getting the camera angle just right.

QoL Feature request:
Allow each craft to retain the last set camera view until the player presses the Home key while in control of that craft. Switching between near by craft with brackets should set the camera to the saved view for said craft. Home key should not affect other craft but only the controlled craft. These camera saves should persist with the game save, allowing restoring from a quick save to keep them set.
